document_data.name: Murrai
document_data.mainbody: '''Murrai''' was the second-in-command of the [[Sand Kings]] rebel group in [[Anauroch]] in [[1479 DR]].
document_data.History:
Murrai was a [[Bedine]] mercenary who decided to join the Sand Kings. In time, he became the second-in-command of the Sand Kings.

In 1479 DR, the Sand Kings discovered that the shadovar were on the verge of gaining control of the [[Spiral Gate]], a crucial [[portal nexus]]. So they tried to sabotage the shadovar's efforts.
document_data.Personality: Murrai was a mercenary at heart, fighting for the love of conflict itself. He was rash and impulsive.
